#Level, gamma and curve adjustment for images.

= Introduction =

Written in Flex 3, here is a standard level, gamma adjustment along with curve for RGB channels.


= Details =

This is functional but not yet version 1. Complete features as follows:
1) white point, black point and gamma adjustments in level.
2) cubic spline for curve adjustments.
3) Red, green and blue channels working.
4) preview functionality.
5) open/close UI.

Things to do before version 1.
1) refactor code to follow MVC architecture.
2) set alpha channel as well.
